p: Large scale drug and phytomedicine repurposing is being currently investigated as it is plausible that anti-retroviral therapy may also be effective against SARS coronavirus [ [57], [58], [59], [60]]. ‘BhAVI-23’ displayed prominent inhibition of HIV-1 RT activity as well as infectivity of P1 (vir) phage thus ascertaining its anti-viral potential. The reverse transcriptase assay based upon HIV-1 RT has been reported earlier as potentially beneficial for the assessment of RT activity from different retroviruses as well as screening tool for the prospective RT inhibitors [ 61].
